synopsis.text: Gridman's Calling: Yuta Hibiki awakens to a world that's both familiar and strange. He's lost his memories and gained an uncanny ability to perceive things that others can't. A mysterious voice from an old computer urges him to remember his calling, and he spots a colossal creature looming in the distance. As chaos unfolds and a monster attacks his school, Yuta finds himself drawn to the computer, merging with the enigmatic Gridman. Transformed into a towering hero, Yuta battles the monstrous threat. Alongside his friends Rikka Takarada and Shou Utsumi, Yuta forms the Gridman Alliance, vowing to protect their city and uncover the truth behind the monsters' emergence. In this thrilling adventure, witness the extraordinary journey of high school students as they navigate the digital world and the real one, standing alongside Gridman in his battle against the kaiju.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
